participant_1.background:
I rode my horse across the countryside as I enjoyed the fresh air and the sun.
my favorite band is radiolead.
I'm passionate about spending time with my family, though it can be difficult at times.
i just bought my first car.
i have a parrot named parrot.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy lifting weights on my days off to stay in shape.
I am a 35-year-old father of two who enjoys spending time with my family.
My parents died when I was young, so my sister and I had to take care of each other.
i am bald.
I took my family camping and let my dogs run around.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Hey there, I'm doing well today, thanks for asking. How about you?
I'm doing great, thanks! I just got back from a ride on my horse. It was so peaceful out there.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to ride a horse.
It's really fun! You should try it sometime.
I definitely will! What kind of horse do you have?
A black and white paint named Shadow. He's a really sweet horse.
That's a beautiful name! I'm sure he's a great companion.
He is! I love spending time with him.
I can see why! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I'm a big fan of radiolead. They're a rock band from Sweden.
I've never heard of them, but I'll have to check them out.
I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
What kind of music do you like?
I'm a fan of all kinds of music, but I really like rock, country, and blues.
I like all of those too! We have a lot in common.
